negotiator.boaframework.sharedagentstate.anac2012
Class AgentMRSAS

java.lang.Object
  negotiator.boaframework.SharedAgentState
      negotiator.boaframework.sharedagentstate.anac2012.AgentMRSAS

public class AgentMRSAS
extends SharedAgentState

This is the shared code of the acceptance condition and bidding strategy of ANAC2012 AgentMR. The code was taken from the ANAC2012 Agent MR and adapted to work within the BOA framework.

Author:
Alex Dirkzwager
